name: Neil Kenes
coverLetter:
GOAL : Seeking a positive employment position in Los Angeles performing tasks such as trimming cannabis.
 
I am responsible and honest when it comes to business practices.

I have trimmed cannabis to the degree I feel competent doing such in larger scale formats. For my personal use, I have cultivated cannabis in soil and via hydroponics. I have grown enough to become fascinated by the diversity and variety of scents of cannabis. 

I’m responsible and hold a strong work ethic when it comes to performing tasks. Although I have no “formal professional experience" working for a cannabis industry employer, I do feel I possess definite skills required for a variety of positions.

I worked numerous years in the general landscape industry - where I gained valuable experience around plants and developed a strong work ethic. 

Thank you for your time and consideration.
